room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: We had a blast the zombie and the professor were awesome. It was a great time to work together with friends and really enjoyed all the puzzles!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Never thought I would enjoy being trapped in a room with a zombie, but it was AWESOME! The clues keep you going and the zombie keeps you on your toes. Thank you for the entertaining evening.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: My wife treated me to an immersive experience I'll never forget. The doctor was spot on with her accent and mannerisms. Oxy proved to be a very convincing zombie that had me - a fan of the zombie apocalypse - scurrying like a rat from her claw-like hands. Sadly, we didn't escape the room. Still, a good time was had by all!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Portland Escape Rooms in Portland
review: Our youngest son arranged for 9 of us to visit the zombie room, and it was AWESOME! Went way above and beyond our expectations. We managed to escape with only 20 seconds to spare. The actors were incredible: our zombie was AMAZING and really kept us all on our toes! Solving the clues while avoiding and distracting the zombie kept the adrenaline, urgency, and laughter flowing throughout the hour.
